alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, or 8 miles northeast of Victoria, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Fannin, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Schroeder, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Coleto Creek Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Oak Village, Inez, Salem, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, Ball Airport Area and Downtown Victoria. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 656. US Highway 77 between mile markers 566 and 594. US Highway 87 between mile markers 800 and 818. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
